attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Beds kill. Over 50% of all deaths in the UK are in bed. This is totally unacceptable in a civilised society.

The facts are stark. That is why the anti-bed society has been formed.

We are succeeding in changing attitudes, and in making people realise that one of their responsibilities is to stay out of bed and go clubbing or stay up and watch late night TV instead.

Not sleeping provides a valuable and cost-effective method of preventing the most common form of death.

We estimate that several hundred thousand lives a year will be saved if people stop going to bed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
